SELECT r.room_id AS roomId, r.title, u.nickname,
r.max_participants AS maxParticipants,
( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM room_join_request rjr WHERE rjr.room_id = r.room_id AND rjr.status = '승인' ) AS currentParticipants,
r.deadline, r.gender, r.created_at AS createdAt,
c2.name AS midCategoryName, c3.name AS subCategoryName
FROM room r JOIN users u ON r.host_user_email = u.email
LEFT JOIN category c3 ON r.categoryId = c3.id LEFT JOIN category c2 ON c3.parent_id = c2.id
WHERE r.status = 'OPEN' ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE room SET status = 'CLOSED' WHERE deadline < CURDATE() AND status = 'OPEN'
UPDATE room r SET r.status = 'CLOSED' WHERE r.status = 'OPEN' AND ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM room_join_request rjr WHERE rjr.room_id = r.room_id AND rjr.status = '승인' ) >= r.max_participants
